name: FAR Labs
description: FAR Labs is an AI innovation and R&D laboratory developing the core technologies, products, and intelligent systems that power the FAR ecosystem. At the center of our stack is FAR AI a decentralized AI compute network that runs open-source language models faster and cheaper than traditional cloud providers. FAR AI acts as the unified engine behind everything we build: large-scale inference, adaptive game intelligence, digital twins, learning agents, and next-generation interactive experiences. FAR Labs integrates three domains under one compute lattice: AI Gaming with dynamic NPCs and evolving worlds; DeSci technologies enabling biometric-driven humanâ€“AI interaction; and advanced AI Systems including agents and digital twins. All utilities, compute operations, and ecosystem interactions are fueled by the $FAR token, the core asset connecting users, node operators, and builders in a rapidly scaling decentralized AI economy.
